page.title: 03Langton Farm Sheep
page.content: This year Mr.Heslop had 130 sheep which lambed. Mr.Heslop tries to give each ewe 2 lambs,so some sheep are put in to the lamb{adopter}until they get used to their adopted lamb.There were 13 pet lambs fed by an{artificial {feeder}, together they drink about 3 gallons of milk a day. The sheep are sheared in early Summer and they are put through the {sheep dip}to prevent maggots spoiling the fleece.Sheep with foot rot are driven several times through the{foot {bath}containing Formlyn,they are also given a 7 in 1{injection}before lambing so the immunity is passed on to the lambs.The lambs are{wormed}and they have their tails{ringed}with an elastic band so they eventually fall off.
